ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (9 inch) prepared angel food cake, torn into bite-size pieces, divided
4 (2.1 ounce) bars chocolate-covered crispy peanut butter candy (such as Butterfinger®), crushed, or more to taste

cookingTips: Use room temperature butter for smooth, creamy frosting
Crush Butterfinger bars into varied sizes for texture contrast
Fold ingredients gently to maintain whipped topping's light texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user layer this no-bake dessert, alternating cake pieces with the butterfinger cream mixture for optimal flavor and presentation.
